articles.content: Even though the retail prices of electric vehicles (EVs) are yet to come on par with the traditional ones that run on petrol or diesel, carmakers across the board are not shying away from jumping on … [+7387 chars]

articles.author: Ketan Thakkar
articles.title: Tata Motors plans to sell half a million cars in FY-23, electric vehicle sales will cross one lakh units: - Economic Times
articles.description: The company has plans of expanding the product portfolio to 10 electric vehicles by 2025 and he expects the share of EVs in total sales to rise to 25% in the next five years.

articles.author: PTI
articles.title: NINL ownership handed over to Tata group-owned TSLP - Economic Times
articles.description: Tata Steel Long Products (TSLP) had in January emerged as the winning bidder, putting in bids worth Rs 12,100 crore for loss-making NINL, which is a joint venture of 4 CPSEs -- MMTC, NMDC, BHEL, MECON -- and 2 Odisha government PSUs -- OMC and IPICOL.
articles.content: The privatisation of Neelachal Nigam Ltd (NINL) was completed on Monday, with its handover to Tata group firm TSLP, the Finance Ministry said. NINL is the second successful privatisation by the curre… [+2328 chars]
